specs.name: Array match example
specs.func: var func = function (clipboard,url,array){if(array.findIndex(function(element){return clipboard==element})!=-1){return url.replace('{*}',clipboard);}else{return false;}}

specs.name: Pattern Match Example
specs.func: var func = function (clipboard,url,pattern){let re = new RegExp(pattern);if(re.test(clipboard)){return 'http://'+url.replace('{*}',clipboard);}else{return false;}}

specs.name: if URL
specs.func: var func = function (clipboard,url,pattern){let re = new RegExp(pattern);if(re.test(clipboard)){return 'http://'+url.replace('{*}',clipboard);}else{return false;}}
